title: Are buying items supposed to hurt your performance?
body:
Buying machete makes you get less minion gold. Wow, very nice. 

I don't recall the solution to support items being used in mid lane for extra gold was to reduce minion gold.

I don't recall the solution to ADCs taking Krugs to be reduce jungle camp gold for non-smite users.

But somehow this is any different. Extremely inconsistent game design. Buying an item should never hinder your gameplay. Just plain stupidity.

replies.body:
you only get less gold if you have the most individual gold on your team, i think

it goes away if you finish your jungle item

Buying armor if you aren't tank = wasted slots

Idk what you're talking about

Well, you suggest a better fix.

These dont hurt the performance of a jungler playing as intended and it has no collateral damage to other roles. 

How would you do it better?
